metadata.title: CVE-2021-21670 jenkins: improper permission checks allow canceling queue items and aborting builds (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability was found in Jenkins. Users with Item/Cancel permission are able to cancel queue items and abort builds of jobs even when they do not have Item/Read permission. 
            
            MITIGATION: As a workaround on earlier versions of Jenkins, do not grant Item/Cancel permission to users who do not have Item/Read permission.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
